title: Mini-Ep 71: Don't Go Chasing (Hard) Waterfalls
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 71: Don't Go Chasing (Hard) Waterfalls
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate hear from someone seeking tips for haircare with hard water, receive an email with thoughts for Kate about her phone journey, and offer advice to a listener who’s wondering if they’ve found “the one”.To leave a voicemail for a future ...
description:
Doree and Kate hear from someone seeking tips for haircare with hard water, receive an email with thoughts for Kate about her phone journey, and offer advice to a listener who’s wondering if they’ve found “the one”.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Big Sky (CA) - You can purchase Big Sky from your favorite audiobook retailer or visit penguinrandomhouse.ca.
  • Buffy - For $20 off your Buffy comforter visit buffy.co and enter promo code FOREVER35. 
  • Fabletics - Get 2 leggings for $24 when you go to fabletics.com/forever35.
  • LOLA - Get 40% off your first month’s subscription when you visit mylola.com and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • Casper - Get $100 toward select mattresses when you visit casper.com/forever35 and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • Pretty Litter - For $20 off your first order, visit prettylitter.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • Daily Harvest - For $25 off your first box, visit daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
